|Nominativ Singular=<small>(der/die)</small> Ablaß

|Genitiv Plural=<small>(der)</small> Ablaß<br><small>(der)</small> Ablaßens
|Dativ Singular=<small>(dem/der)</small> Ablaß
|Dativ Plural=<small>(den)</small> Ablaß<br><small>(den)</small> Ablaßens
|Akkusativ Singular=<small>(den/die)</small> Ablaß
|Akkusativ Plural=<small>(die)</small> Ablaß<br><small>(die)</small> Ablaßens
